name: Christmas Cars
description:
A very rough prototype of an idea I made over christmas for a 12 games of Christmas challenge.

Based around some modifications to Kenney's Cars code it implements multiplayer using Mirror and should work across most networks (mileage across Internet will vary).

It's very rough and was done quickly, not sure if I'll extend it. Race around the city collecting presents versus your friends over a network.

Arrows keys to move, shift to boost, collide into people to make them drop their presents. 
Save your presents at the beacons to score and save points.

VERY rough alpha.
